QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: videoSource
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Source for video. UDP, TCP, RTSP and UVC Cameras may be supported depending on Vehicle and ground station version.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: udpUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: UDP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: 0.0.0.0:5600

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtspUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: tcpUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: TCP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: 192.168.143.200:3001

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: httpUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: HTTP/HTTPS URL for MJPEG video stream. Format: http://host:port/path (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:5077/video_feed for PixEagle, or http://camera-ip/mjpeg for IP cameras).

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: httpTimeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Connection timeout for HTTP video streams in seconds.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: httpRetryAttempts
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Number of automatic retry attempts when HTTP stream connection fails.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: httpBufferSize
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Size of HTTP read buffer in bytes. Larger values may improve throughput on high-bandwidth connections.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: httpKeepAlive
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Enable HTTP keep-alive for persistent connections. Recommended for better performance.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: httpUserAgent
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: User-Agent string sent with HTTP requests. Used for server-side logging and identification.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: websocketUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: WebSocket URL for video stream. Format: ws://host:port/path (e.g., ws://192.168.1.100:5077/ws/video_feed for PixEagle).

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: websocketTimeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Connection timeout for WebSocket video streams in seconds.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: websocketReconnectDelay
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Delay in milliseconds before attempting to reconnect after WebSocket disconnection.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: websocketHeartbeat
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Interval in milliseconds for sending heartbeat/ping messages to keep WebSocket connection alive.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: adaptiveQuality
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Automatically adjust video quality based on network conditions. Only applies to WebSocket streams.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: minQuality
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Minimum JPEG quality percentage for adaptive quality control.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: maxQuality
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Maximum JPEG quality percentage for adaptive quality control.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: websocketBufferFrames
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Number of frames to buffer in WebSocket receive queue. Lower values reduce latency, higher values improve stability.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: videoSavePath
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Directory to save videos to.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: aspectRatio
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Video Aspect Ratio (width / height). Use 0.0 to ignore it.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: gridLines
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Displays a grid overlaid over the video view.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: videoFit
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Handle Video Aspect Ratio.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showRecControl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Show recording control in the UI.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: recordingFormat
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Video recording file format.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: maxVideoSize
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Maximum amount of disk space used by video recording.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: enableStorageLimit
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: When enabled, old video files will be auto-deleted when the total size of QGC-recorded video exceeds the maximum video storage usage.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtspTimeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: streamEnabled
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Start/Stop Video Stream.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: disableWhenDisarmed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Disable Video Stream when disarmed.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: lowLatencyMode
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled, the rtpjitterbuffer is removed and the video sink is set to assynchronous mode, reducing the latency by about 200 ms.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: forceVideoDecoder
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Force the change of prioritization between video decode methods, allowing the user to force some video hardware decode plugins if necessary.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.enumStrings: Default,Force software decoder,Force hardware decoder,Force NVIDIA decoder,Force VA-API decoder,Force DirectX3D 11 decoder,Force VideoToolbox decoder,Force Intel decoder,Force Vulkan decoder
